abstract: There appears to be a great desire to believe that Fake Steve Jobs just might be the real one. Reaction and counterreaction to the unveiling of the Apple chief’s alter ego.
snippet: There appears to be a great desire to believe that Fake Steve Jobs just might be the real one. Reaction and counterreaction to the unveiling of the Apple chief’s alter ego.
lead_paragraph: Brad Stone pulled the wraps off of Fake Steve Jobs before Dan Lyons, a.k.a. Fake Steve, and Forbes, his employer, could pull the wraps off Fake Steve Jobs on their own. That got a lot of people in a lather, as you can see from the comments to the blog post about the article.
